original_text: Look at what is before your eyes. If anyone is confident that he is Christ's, let him remind himself that just as he is Christ's, so also are we.
korean_text: 너희는 외모만 보는도다 만일 사람이 자기가 그리스도에게 속한 줄을 믿을진대 자기가 그리스도에게 속한 것 같이 우리도 그러한 줄을 자기 속으로 다시 생각할 것이라

sentences.original_text: Look at what is before your eyes.
If anyone is confident that he is Christ's,
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 누군가 자기가 그리스도의 것이라고 확신한다면,

sentences.original_text: that just as he is Christ's,
